description: Police and protesters clashed on Lesbos and Chios over plans to build new migrant centres.
title: Greek protests: Dozens hurt as island clashes intensify
title_page: Greek protests: Dozens hurt as island clashes intensify - BBC News
maintext: Dimitra Kalogeropoulou, Greek head of the International Rescue Committee, said the tensions should be no surprise, adding that overcrowding "is good for no one; local communities feel their islands have been transformed into giant prisons, while asylum seekers are forced to live in dangerous conditions".
